name: The Forbidden Flame
description:
This is the first game jam that everybody in my team did and we are pretty proud of what we managed to do during this. 

Themes

Break the Rules = Entering a forbidden forest to seek the forbidden flame

Harder, Better, Faster, Stronger = Get upgraded abilities to be able to survive the dangers lurking in the forest.

Unconventional Weapon = The only weapon you got is your trusty lantern that you use to store the forbidden flames, which gives you your abilities.

Controls:

WASD to move, or left control stick on controller

Hold Shift to Sprint, or hold "B" on controller

Spacebar to interact when prompted, or "A" on controller

Left Click, or "X" on controller to Attack (You don't have an attack at first but you get one later :) )

"Q" and "E", or use bumpers on controller to swap abilities when you get more of them.
